mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbbs_tiezi WHERE createtime > #{nowdate} and isuse='1') tttiezi, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbbs_tiezi WHERE createtime > #{qnowdate} AND createtime < #{nowdate} and isuse='1') zttiezi, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbbs_tiezi WHERE isuse='1') ztiezi, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbbs_user) zuser, (SELECT MAX(id) FROM jbbs_user) userid, (SELECT loginname FROM jbbs_user WHERE id=(SELECT MAX(id) FROM jbbs_user)) username FROM DUAL where 1=1

SELECT aaa.id,aaa.name,aaa.flag FROM (SELECT *,'1' flag FROM jbbs_tiezi where isuse='1' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,7 )aaa
UNION ALL
SELECT bbb.id,bbb.name,bbb.flag FROM ( SELECT t1.*,'2' flag FROM jbbs_tiezi t1 LEFT JOIN jbbs_huifu t2 ON t2.id=t1.huifuid WHERE t2.id IS NOT NULL and t1.isuse='1' ORDER BY t2.createtime DESC LIMIT 0, 7)bbb
UNION ALL
SELECT ccc.id,ccc.name,ccc.flag FROM ( SELECT t1.*,'3' flag FROM jbbs_tiezi t1 WHERE t1.createtime > #{zdate} and t1.isuse='1' ORDER BY t1.findcount DESC LIMIT 0,7 ) ccc
